      (\<lambda>\<MM>\<NN>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>composable_arrs (dg_FUNCT \<alpha> \<AA> \<BB>). \<MM>\<NN>\<lparr>0\<rparr> \<bullet>\<^sub>N\<^sub>T\<^sub>C\<^sub>F\<^bsub>\<AA>,\<BB>\<^esub> \<MM>\<NN>\<lparr>1\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr>)
